arts.sum: Eric Roy doesn’t have any fresh injury concerns as Stade Brestois prepare for a historic night as they make their UEFA Champions League debut, against Sturm Graz, in Guingamp. Some…

arts.ttl: Brest vs Sturm Graz: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: French side Brest make their Champions League debut on Thursday evening when they host Austrian outfit Sturm Graz at Stade Francis-Le Ble. After a stunning 2023/24 campaign which saw them finish third in Ligue 1 and qualify for a European competition for the first time, Brest begin their Champions League adventure with a favourable home fixture.

arts.ttl: Eric Roy on Brest’s ‘duty to exist’ ahead of Champions League debut

arts.ttl: Preview: Brest vs. Sturm Graz - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's Champions League clash between Brest and Sturm Graz, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
